metadata.title: CVE-2023-40550 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read flaw was found in Shim when it tried to validate theSBAT information. This issue may expose sensitive data during the system'sboot phase.

criterions.comment: secureboot-db package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
shim-signed package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
shim package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
